import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import Axios from 'axios'; // to make API calls async function postImage({image}) { const formData = new FormData(); formData.append("image", image) const result = await Axios.post('http://localhost:3001/images', formData, { headers: {'Content-Type': 'multipart/form-data'}}) return result.data } export const Projects = (props) => { const[enteredName, setEnteredName] = useState(''); const[enteredEmail, setEnteredEmail] = useState(''); const[enteredSummary,setEnteredSummary] = useState(''); const [file, setFile] = useState(); const [images, setImages] = useState([]); const fileSelected = event => { const file = event.target.files[0] setFile(file) } const submit_for_review = async event => { event.preventDefault(); const projectDetails = {final_project_name : enteredName, final_email : enteredEmail, final_summary: enteredSummary} console.log(projectDetails); Axios.post("http://localhost:3001/api/insert", {project_name: enteredName, project_summary : enteredSummary}).then(()=>{ alert("Successful Insert of Project name and Summary"); }); const result = await postImage({image: file}) setImages([result.image, ...images]) setEnteredName(''); setEnteredEmail(''); setEnteredSummary(''); }; return (
